articles.author: stephen.beacham@cbsi.com (CNET.com), CNET
articles.title: Facebook's news blackout explained
articles.description: The site blacks out news outlets in Australia over proposed legislation that would require Facebook to pay news publishers for content. Here's how such rules could affect you, and why other governments may follow suit.

articles.title: Cat Girl Nuku Nuku (Dub) - Episode 10 - Nuku Nuku and Ryunosuke! It Was a Very Alligator Night
articles.description: Mishima has developed a new "DNA Changer," but it gets mixed up with an energy drink Akiko brings home from the office. As Ryunosuke is doing homework, he chugs it and turns into an alligator! Chaos erupts as he's forced to flee the house, and only Nuku Nuku …

articles.title: Cat Girl Nuku Nuku (Dub) - Episode 8 - Nuku Nuku and the Mystery of the Universe! An Encounter with Mysterious Life Form Michi-Michi!
articles.description: Chieko invites the class to an moon-watching party in her garden, where a UFO appears! A space mouse, Michi-Michi, beams down from it and confesses her love for their teacher Yamagata. But Mishima Industries attempts to capture her, and Nuku Nuku has to stop …

articles.title: Cat Girl Nuku Nuku (Sub) - Episode 7 - Nuku Nuku Goes Across Time! Proposal at the Bon Dance!
articles.description: It's the day of the Bon festival. Akiko reminisces about how Kyusaku proposed to her on this day. When Nuku Nuku and Ryunosuke bike so fast to school that they travel through time, they witness the proposal themselves, and learn why Kyusaku fights Mishima so …

articles.title: Cat Girl Nuku Nuku (Dub) - Episode 9 - Nuku Nuku Runs! The Great Sports Festival. Is That Right?!

articles.title: Cat Girl Nuku Nuku (Dub) - Episode 13 - The Diary of Nuku Nuku's Youth! An All Purpose Cultural Musical!
articles.description: Nuku Nuku's class decides to film a movie. After a chance remark by Ryunosuke, she becomes depressed that as an Androbot, she can't share the passion of their youth and the sweat of their efforts. But she channels this into making her starring performance eve…

articles.title: Cat Girl Nuku Nuku (Dub) - Episode 6 - Nuku Nuku's Mid-Summer Battle! Trap of the Esper Girls!

articles.description: It's all over TV; the German company Zweig is coming to Japan to face off against Mishima's strongest robot, Sangoku Bross. But Nuku Nuku's uneasy for some reason. Zweig's robot takes the announcer hostage, and Sangoku Bross refuses to risk harming her... luc…

articles.title: Ninja Scroll: The Series (Sub) - Episode 3 - Forbidden Love
articles.description: The battles heat up as both the Kimon and Hiruko Clans search for the Dragon Stone and the Light Maiden. Neither side is willing to give up the Stone, and it is a bloody free-for-all to see who can get both the Stone and the Maiden.

articles.title: Ninja Scroll: The Series (Dub) - Episode 13 - Farewell Jubei
articles.description: The memories of the Light Maiden are awakening inside Shigure's head. But her recovery comes too late - Jubei has fallen in battle, and this leaves only Shigure to unlock the powers of the Light Maiden that will decide the fate of them all. She must face a fi…

articles.title: Ninja Scroll: The Series (Dub) - Episode 5 - The Diamond Child
articles.description: Meet Tatsunosuke, a young thief with a special gift and nothing to lose. Matched against Tsubute, which thief will come out with the Dragon Stone in his pocket? Faced with the opportunity to join the Kimon, will Tatsunosuke take the chance, and pay for it wit…

articles.title: Ninja Scroll: The Series (Sub) - Episode 2 - Departure
articles.description: With no other choice, Shigure sets out with Dakuan and Tsubute to find the answers about who she really is. Meanwhile, Jubei must fight off both Hiruko and Kimon ninjas and deliver the Dragon Stone to Shigure.

articles.title: Ninja Scroll: The Series (Dub) - Episode 1 - Tragedy in the Hidden Village
articles.description: What is destiny? One Hiruko ninja has stolen the sacred Dragon Stone with the hopes of setting his clan free from a life of darkness. The Kimon Clan, however, has other plans for the Stone as well as the Light Maiden.

articles.title: Ninja Scroll: The Series (Sub) - Episode 5 - The Diamond Child
articles.description: Meet Tatsunosuke, a young thief with a special gift and nothing to lose. Matched against Tsubute, which thief will come out with the Dragon Stone in his pocket? Faced with the opportunity to join the Kimon, will Tatsunosuke take the chance, and pay for it wit…

articles.title: Ninja Scroll: The Series (Sub) - Episode 13 - Farewell Jubei
articles.description: The memories of the Light Maiden are awakening inside Shigure's head. But her recovery comes too late - Jubei has fallen in battle, and this leaves only Shigure to unlock the powers of the Light Maiden that will decide the fate of them all. She must face a fi…

articles.title: Ninja Scroll: The Series (Dub) - Episode 8 - The Fate of Rengoku
articles.description: Rengoku has her mission - to get the other half of the Dragon Stone from Jubei. This is also her chance to avenge the death of her beloved brother, but at what cost? With revenge on her mind, what will Rengoku sacrifice for the ability to kill Jubei?

articles.title: Ninja Scroll: The Series (Dub) - Episode 7 - Blossom
articles.description: Azami is back, and after the half of Dragon Stone she could not get the first time, determined not to lose it to the Kimon clan. Meanwhile, Jubei learns the truth about the Dragon Stone and the treasure of the Lost Dynasty, and he's slowly figuring out just h…

articles.title: Ninja Scroll: The Series (Dub) - Episode 2 - Departure
articles.description: With no other choice, Shigure sets out with Dakuan and Tsubute to find the answers about who she really is. Meanwhile, Jubei must fight off both Hiruko and Kimon ninjas and deliver the Dragon Stone to Shigure.

articles.title: Ninja Scroll: The Series (Dub) - Episode 12 - Dynasty Restoration
articles.description: How far can you trust your senses? Jubei's commitment to save Shigure pays off when he, Dakuan, and Tsubute execute a successful rescue mission. But something is wrong, and Shigure is acting strangely. The outcome of war may depend on Jubei finding out why!

articles.title: Ninja Scroll: The Series (Sub) - Episode 8 - The Fate of Rengoku
articles.description: Rengoku has her mission - to get the other half of the Dragon Stone from Jubei. This is also her chance to avenge the death of her beloved brother, but at what cost? With revenge on her mind, what will Rengoku sacrifice for the ability to kill Jubei?

articles.title: Ninja Scroll: The Series (Sub) - Episode 1 - Tragedy in the Hidden Village
articles.description: What is destiny? One Hiruko ninja has stolen the sacred Dragon Stone with the hopes of setting his clan free from a life of darkness. The Kimon Clan, however, has other plans for the Stone as well as the Light Maiden.

articles.title: Ninja Scroll: The Series (Sub) - Episode 10 - The Heart of the Hiruko
articles.description: Who is Rokai? When Shigure is threatened by Yamidoro and his clan, a protector appears in the form of a strange little man with amazing abilities. However, even he cannot prevent the Kimon from kidnapping Shigure. Someone must save the Light Maiden!

articles.title: Ninja Scroll: The Series (Sub) - Episode 9 - A Dragon Within
articles.description: Until now, no one has fully understood the secrets of the Light Maiden. But they are revealed at last when the Hiruko warrior Zofu saves Shigure from a clan of assassins and forces her to face a place and purpose she did not choose.

articles.title: Ninja Scroll: The Series (Dub) - Episode 9 - A Dragon Within
articles.description: Until now, no one has fully understood the secrets of the Light Maiden. But they are revealed at last when the Hiruko warrior Zofu saves Shigure from a clan of assassins and forces her to face a place and purpose she did not choose.

articles.title: Ninja Scroll: The Series (Dub) - Episode 6 - Shelter from the Rain
articles.description: Apart from the others, Jubei finds himself poisoned in battle with Nenmu, a ninja who can use the bodies of people. Caught in a rainstorm, with the help of a woman and her young son, Jubei slowly recuperates from the poison. But with Nenmu's ability to manipu…
